name: waves-ride
description: Waves Ride language support and Waves JS Console for Visual Studio Code
author: wavesplatform

rideExtension.languageServer.maxNumberOf.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

rideExtension.LanguageServer.trace.serve.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

rideExtension.repl.SEED.default: our default example seed for ride extension plugin inside visual studio code
rideExtension.repl.SEED.description: Seed phrase that is used to create keypair. This keypair will be used as default inside REPL

rideExtension.repl.CHAIN_ID.description: Network byte. 'T' for testnet, 'W' for mainnet

scripts.publish-server: npm run compile:server && cd server && npm run publish-server
scripts.publish-server-beta: npm run compile:server && cd server && npm run publish-server  --tag beta
scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd extension && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile && npm run updateTmLanguage
scripts.compile: npm run compile:extension && npm run compile:server
scripts.postinstall: cd extension && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
